mapper.select:
select ifnull(d.department_seq,0) as 'department_seq', a.areaname, o.officename, d.departmentname,
(select count(*) from tb_equipment e join tb_employee em on e.employeenumber=em.employeenumber where e.assetYN=0 and em.department_seq=d.department_seq) as 'assetdaesang',
(select count(*) from tb_equipment e join tb_employee em on e.employeenumber=em.employeenumber where e.nclientsetup=0 and e.assetYN=0 and em.department_seq=d.department_seq) as 'assetreceive',
(select count(*) from tb_equipment e join tb_employee em on e.employeenumber=em.employeenumber where e.assetYN=1 and em.department_seq=d.department_seq) as 'noassetdaesang',
(select count(*) from tb_equipment e join tb_employee em on e.employeenumber=em.employeenumber where e.nclientsetup=0 and e.assetYN=1 and em.department_seq=d.department_seq) as 'noassetreceive' from tb_area a left join tb_office o on o.area_seq=a.area_seq left join tb_department d on o.office_seq=d.office_seq where a.active=0
and date(a.created)>#{swDate}
and a.areaname=#{areaname}
select areaname from tb_area where active=0

select a.areaname,o.officename,d.departmentname,em.employeename,eq.equipmentid,eq.created,eq.nclientsetup,eq.assetYN from tb_equipment eq join tb_employee em on eq.employeenumber=em.employeenumber join tb_department d on em.department_seq=d.department_seq join tb_office o on em.office_seq=o.office_seq join tb_area a on em.area_seq=a.area_seq where em.department_seq=#{department_seq} ;

select count(*) from ( select a.areaname,o.officename,d.departmentname,em.employeename,eq.equipmentid,eq.created,eq.nclientsetup,eq.assetYN from tb_equipment eq join tb_employee em on eq.employeenumber=em.employeenumber join tb_department d on em.department_seq=d.department_seq join tb_office o on em.office_seq=o.office_seq join tb_area a on em.area_seq=a.area_seq where em.department_seq=#{department_seq}) ee
